title: Implement End-to-End Dashboard Customization Integration
description:
Create end-to-end integration tests and complete dashboard customization functionality that ties together all components. This task focuses on ensuring the complete user workflow works seamlessly from viewing the widget library to customizing and persisting dashboard layouts across sessions.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Implements comprehensive E2E tests for complete dashboard customization workflow
- Verifies widget library displays all 5 required widget types correctly
- Tests add/remove functionality with proper state persistence
- Validates drag-and-drop rearrangement with layout persistence
- Confirms responsive behavior works across mobile/desktop breakpoints
- Ensures dashboard state persists across browser sessions
- Tests error handling and edge cases (empty states, invalid operations)
- Validates accessibility compliance throughout the workflow
- Provides integration with existing CI/CD testing infrastructure
